thread.section_title: Ashburn Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: cirque de soleil
thread.title_full: cirque de soleil - Review of Ashburn Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Elizabeth D
title: cirque de soleil
text:
Found the hotel on line and it seemed very convenient to the Albert Hall at a good price.
Arrived at Gloucester Rd.tube station in pouring rain so the location was brilliant.
Welcome and check in very smooth and our room was everything the website promised.
So impressed by duty receptionist who hailed us a taxi in pouring rain
A treat of glass of prossecco on arriving back made a nice end to our evening.
A good night's sleep,hot water and an amazing continental breakfast.
Our case was looked after while we visited nearby Natural History museum.
74 bus makes an alternative to nearby tube.
We shall be back. Your staff are so helpful and hotel is spotless.
Thankyou.
